entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
